comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Way to go Team Flagstaff Frenzy! Wear your tee shirts proudly. You can ride Flag today, Dave, but you can't do #700 without me, so wait until next week for that. Got it, Old Ribeye?! Aw, I shouldn't rib you about things of such gravvy...I mean gravity. Have fun out there today and tomorrow, boys! Greg, I'm bringing my bike to Denver on Friday. You?

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I don't know how he knows, but Werner tells me Daddy Bruce will be the attending physician in the O.R.. Nothing grosser than scrubs with bbq sauce stains. It'll be weird coming out of the ether to the smell of hickory smoke. Holy cow.

comments.author: iSean
comments.body: I saw this and thought I'd share (since we keep talking about "below the belt humor" and microwaves) http://gizmodo.com/375711/bagetty-wiener-microwave

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Popcorn is an apt metaphor, my friend! I picture [graupel](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graupel), as it's round enough to rebound upon impact. Again, DO NOT DO 700 WITHOUT ME TOMORROW! I'll be back Monday. There's always NCAR or walking.

comments.author: Matt
comments.body: The handshake with Todd looks a bit forced. Side note: did you get another A&S DATC yet?
